title: Final MOCK DRAFT of 2021 + Zip It Up, Know Your League - Fantasy Football Podcast for 8/27
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Andy, Mike, and Jason battle it out in the final mock draft show of the 2021 season. Plus, the latest NFL News, including Jameis Winston being named starting QB for the Saints! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for August 27th, 2021.
  
 Dominate your fantasy football draft with the 2021 Ultimate Draft Kit -- get the Draft Analyzer with the UDK+
 Full Mock Draft Results on Sleeper
  
 (05:05) - #FootClan Friday
 (08:15) - NFL News
 (16:30) - Mock Draft
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
